title: [Large-Scale] Generative AI-Integrated Experiential Learning and Authenticity Assessment Design for Pre-Service Elementary Mathematics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of elementary mathematics education theory and experience using digital tools
context.additional_context: A corporate teacher training program focusing on integrating generative AI tools with mathematics education practices

learning_goals: Design and implement at least three elementary-level real-world math problem-solving projects using generative AI (GenAI)
Establish five evaluation criteria for assessing the authenticity of AI-generated content and apply them to real-world cases
Create guidelines incorporating ethical considerations when designing experiential learning activities based on AI tools

resources: Video Conferencing System for Project Presentations

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
